channel.title: Start/stop process inside application by other process in the same application
channel.description: Hi My application contains several processes. Is it possible that one of the processes is started (or not started) by the other process in the same application. Thanks, Rafi

item.description:
you can use IPC to call from one component to another component.

item.title: Start/stop process inside application by other process in the same application
item.dc:creator: rafikiel
item.description:
Hi
My application contains several processes. Is it possible that one of the processes is started (or not started) by the other process in the same application.
Thanks,
Rafi
